title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Evidence-Based Instructional Strategy Design for Students with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Core characteristics of learning disabilities and foundational knowledge of secondary science curricula
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Design over three evidence-based instructional strategies considering cognitive and learning characteristics of students with learning disabilities.
Explain application methods for multisensory teaching strategies to deliver science concepts in VR simulation environments with over 80% accuracy.
Assessment materials can be modified to align with strategic instructional methods to improve academic achievement for students with learning disabilities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
